Class ConnectionActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • edu.hartford.ubr1app.ConnectionActivity

  • public class ConnectionActivity
extends Activity
    Connection Activity Handles getting an IP and port number and verifying the IP responds to ping tests
    Author:
    roberthilton

    • Method Detail

      • startNewActv

        public void startNewActv(View view)
        Method to pass the IP and Port to the MainActivity. Checks whether the IP is valid using a ping. A dialog is displayed to show whether the result is successful or not.
        Parameters:
        view - - The current view passed into the handler method.
